verbose_text: Water rewards given to mice that were proficient at the lever pressing task did not elicit dendritic calcium (XREF_FIG), in contrast to random rewards given during the detection task (p = 0.0035, n = 11 lever-task sessions from 3 of the 4 mice used in the 44 detection task sessions).
evidence: Water rewards given to mice that were proficient at the lever-pressing task did not elicit dendritic calcium
